item.title: Flutter
item.author: Author
item.description: Flutter is Google’s UI toolkit for building beautiful, natively compiled applications for mobile, web, desktop, and embedded devices from a single codebase. Flutter uses Dart to generate native code. Features Stateful Hot Reload Expressive and Flexible UI Native Performance Widgets Each element on a screen of the flutter app is a widget. Types of Widgets Stateless Widgets Stateful Widgets List of Widgets Scaffold body appbar Libraries dart:core dart:async dart:math dart:convert dart:html dart:io Packages Connectivity Plus For discovering network connectivity and configuring themselves accordingly.
